title: Proposal: Add SafeSnap module to Opium Ecosystem
body:
I propose to add a SafeSnap module to Opium Ecosystem gnosis safe. The SafeSnap module should have default settings similar to other DeFi projects.

### Rationale
The SafeSnap module would improve the quality of SnapShot voting. It will allow proposals to be described more precisely by including the required on-chain execution params.


Read the full proposal and discussion on the governance forum:
https://forum.opium.network/t/proposal-add-safesnap-module-to-opium-ecosystem/256
author: 0xFFc8d9910Fb9910B57A9783B841E43f8Dd5b4c77
